title: Hotel Galvez Ghost Tour Dinners in Galveston
address: 2024 Seawall Blvd Galveston, TX 77550 United States
body: Hotel Galvez & Spa opens its ghost tour, typically reserved for guests, to the public as part of a dinner tour package on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays in October. During the tour, their staff will guide participants through the ghostly past of the hotel which is then followed by dinner in the Galvez Bar & Grill. Admission: Tickets are $45.

title: Robert Ellis in Concert at Discovery Green
address: 1500 Mckinney St Houston, TX 77010 United States
body: Houston native and country singer Robert Ellis performs at Discovery Green with openers The Texas Gentlemen. Admission Free to attend.

title: Mommy Mingle Wednesday at Children’s Museum
address: 1500 Binz St. Houston, TX 77004 United States
body: Bring your little ones to the Tot*Spot in the Children's Museum, and mingle with other mommies during Mommy Mingle Wednesdays. Daddies, nannies, and caretakers are welcome, too. Enjoy free coffee and snacks on them. Admission This event is included with general admission.

title: Hansel and Gretel at Miller Outdoor Theatre
address: 6000 Hermann Park Drive Houston, TX 77030 United States
body: The famous fairy tale from the Brothers Grimm, Hansel and Gretel, comes to operatic life in a 45-minute, family-friendly production at Miller Outdoor Theatre. Admission This event is free to attend.

title: Real Ale Dinner at Hay Merchant
address: 1100 Westheimer Rd Houston, TX 77006 United States
body: Friend of Hay Merchant and Real Ale owner Brad Farbstein is coming to town, and to celebrate, the taproom will be letting guests build their own beer dinner with a selection of off-the-menu dishes paired with Real Ale beers. Admission Menu items will be sold a la carte.

title: The Texas Gentlemen In-Store Performance at Cactus Music
address: 2110 Portsmouth St Houston, TX 77098 United States
body: North Texas roots-rock collective The Texas Gentlemen play songs off their new record TX Jelly at Cactus Music. Complimentary refreshments will be provided by Saint Arnold. Admission Free to attend.

title: Customer Appreciation Night at Good Dog Heights Location
address: 903 Studewood St Houston , TX 77008 United States
body: Good Dog in the Heights hosts their monthly Customer Appreciation Night featuring 6 beers on tap from Legal Draft Beer Co. and free sweet rocky road treats. Admission No cover.

title: The Simpsons Trivia at Under the Brewery
address: 1506 Truxillo St Houston, TX 77004 United States
body: Yell out "D'oh!" and show off what you know about Homer, Bart, and Marge during The Simpsons Trivia night at Under the Radar Brewery. Admission  No cover.

title: Alley Theatre presents Describe the Night
address: 3351 Cullen Blvd. Houston, TX 77204 United States
body: Check out the world premiere of Describe the Night, a play that tells the story of men and women, spies, conspiracy theories, and the ever onward passage of time. Admission Tickets start at $16.

title: Game of Thrones Trivia Night at Your Pie in Downtown
address: 1625 Main Street Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: They’ll be serving up specialty Mystical GoT Neapolitan-style pizzas, giving away more than $50 in weekly prizes, and offering up $12.99 pizza and beer/wine specials for players ready to test their Game of Thrones knowledge and earn the trivia title of “Breaker of Chains”. No cover to play; $12.99 for Build-Your-Pizza plus draft beer (under $6) or house wine (cab or chardonnay). Up to five players per team.

title: Miears & Mark Drew DJ Set at MKT Bar
address: 1001 Austin St Houston, TX 77010 United States
body: Musicians Miears and Mark Drew get together to guest DJ at MKT Bar in Downtown. Admission No cover.
